review_text: This place is absolutely beautiful! Clean and comfortable. We really loved the decor and layout. Wonderful Hosts. We would definitely stay here again.
As always, a great stay, well worth the money! Will stay again.

We were in town visiting Shoshone Falls and enjoyed how close this was to that. Simple check in and check out. Very nice Airbnb and the bed was so comfortable! We were a little surprised of the noise coming from in the house as we could hear conversations. But it was fine as we didn’t spend that much time during the day in the Airbnb. Great place for the price.
My wife and I had a wonderful stay. It was perfect for the two of us. She was responsive to our questions. Her husband was helpful too. I enjoyed speaking with him.
Christine's place was nice and neat. We would definitely stay here again.

I enjoyed Troy and Christine's place! They were so responsive to all of my messages (both prior to and during my stay) providing me with helpful information for my arrival, checkin and stay.
The AirBnB has excellent amenities and I made a lot of use of the kitchette. The apartment was immaculate and bed comfortable. Peaceful and quiet location.
We loved the bed!!!! We loved the clean!!! But the host never responded when the WiFi went out and the check out tasks were excessive for an airbnb. Thank you!
This is a cool little spot. Set up well and clean
Great Stay! This was actually my 2nd stay here, highly recommend
This was a great place to retreat. We were comfortable. It was clean,quiet and no nonsense. I would definitely stay here again. Highly recommend!!!!!

Wonderful stay! Perfect bed. Very clean and comfortable. I messaged to let them know I was arriving late... they left the lights and the heat on so when I arrived it was warm and cozy. I was very grateful for that! I felt right at home. I highly recommend! Thank you
Excellent private location that is newer and very clean. Host was great at communicating in a timely manner. I would definitely stay here again.
Wonderful and clean! Highly recommend and will stay again.
perfection!!!

The accommodations were comfortable and spotless. We were driving through on a road trip and this was the perfect place to stop overnight. Very convenient to the freeway. We would love to stay here again…no question!
Great place to stay. Very clean, great hosts
Wonderful clean stay with amazing views for the sunset. Would definitely stay here again!
My husband and I are repeat visitors. This is the nicest Airbnb we've stayed at. You won't be disappointed. :)
Be sure to find it before dark! Beautiful sunset & sunrise....Nice place! Very quiet!
This unit was perfect. Cozy, clean, and in a super quiet neighborhood. The hosts were very kind and responsive. I would absolutely stay here again. :)

This is our 3rd stay at Troy and Christine's place. It's always a pleasure. Extremely clean and relaxing and a lovely area. We've visited each time on a road trip. Our only complaint is that we've not had more time to enjoy it.

This space is beautifully decorated and crispy clean. You’ll get a great look at one of Twin Falls famous sunsets through the large windows.
Check out was easy enough. Throw the towels and bedding in the laundry basket and carry out the trash.
Clean place! Really enjoyed staying here. The hosts were very helpful and friendly!

This was my second stay at Christine's place and it was just as great as the first time. If you need a place to stay in this area and would like a very peaceful place and don't mind taking a short trip into Twin Falls for restaurants and other things then definitely look at booking this place first. Very clean with an extremely comfortable bed. I cannot say one bad thing about the overall stay.

Christine and Troy were kind, responsive and great hosts. The space was exceptional, clean, inviting and spacious. The driveway parking was very convenient for our van, and the neighborhood was quiet and safe. We will definitely stay here again if we are back in the area. Lovely and so clean; thank you!!!

This was a beautiful well kept and very clean and inviting place to stay. We would 100% stay there again when visiting our daughter in Kimberly. The host responded almost immediately to my questions and was very helpful.

Absolutely amazing place to stay! Very clean with comfortable bed, pillows, bedding and sofa. Located in a nice and quiet country neighborhood that you could go out for a casual walk in and feel totally at ease and safe in. So much cheaper than a hotel room and 100 times nicer. Definitely a place to look for first when staying in this area.

This place was brand new. Absolutely beautiful. The hosts were more than helpful. Responded right away to text. The hosts were very easy going and work with your situation. We very much appreciated such a beautiful place to stay. The best thing of all is super SOFT WATER!!. AWESOME SHOWER....BIG ENOUGH FOR 2.
Great place! Very quiet ,peaceful and comfortable. I highly recommend staying here.
Such a cute space! Quiet, clean and cozy! Travel nurse friendly. Would absolutely recommend a stay here.

Loved this stay. Was a very nice room. Christine and Troy were very understanding with crazy loud babies at night and toddlers running around. Responded very fast and the area was close to town. Had a great time week here.

Unfortunately because of an unexpected emergency I was only able to stay one night but it is a lovely place--spacious, has all the amenities, beautiful furnishings, and very clean. The hosts were very kind and responsive. I look forward to returning in the future.
really nice place
Great location, close to interstate for easy travel. Made us feel right at home, very responsive and accommodating. Definitely will stay again!

Nice place that was quiet and cozy. My favorite things about the place were the shower and tv. The bed wasn't uncomfortable but the mattress was a bit firm for our taste. But I know that's just a personal preference at the end of the day.
Wish it was available on the way back but it was a pleasure even for just one night.
Christine was super responsive. Room was super nice and cozy. Everything was super clean, modern and nice.
We always love staying here!
This air bnb is beautiful! The surroundings are peaceful, and it’s a perfect space for a small family. We love staying here, it’s a great overnight stop on our road trips!
Comfy beds, clean space, warm and cozy!
Greats hosts and beautiful apartment!
Nice clean place, we will be back

I enjoyed my stay here. I felt right at home when I pulled into the drive. Welcoming decorations, well lighted, comfortable furnishings, clean and quiet. I had a restful night. I would definitely stay here again.
This is a beautiful place to stay, super clean and cute. The hosts were very friendly and responsive when we had questions too.
Christine and Troy were wonderful hosts! It snowed and the snow was cleared quickly, Troy even swept off our vehicle. Very responsive and the space was beautiful.
Great place to stay if you’re looking for a clean place to sleep/shower on a road trip!
Christine's place was very spacious, clean and safe. Location was very quiet also. We liked little touches like instructions around the space and the mini kitchen area.
Wonderful place. comfortable bed and beautiful place

Everything was as advertised and more. Just the spot I was looking for. Very quiet and quaint neighborhood. Anytime I’m in this area again, this will be my first choice to stay. Christine was very clear and made everything so simple.
Perfect stop for a good nights sleep in our road trip from Seattle to Salt Lake.
We had an amazing stay! The place was very nice, clean, modern, and cozy, and it was in a new and quiet neighborhood. It felt very private. I would definitely stay here again!

My wife and I drove up 6 hours for a family member's funeral. I didn't communicate this with Christine (not for any particular reason), but feel prompted to share that in the public review because of how flexible they were with our check-in time. We ended up arriving at 12:30 AM (we had left home shortly after work). I was very grateful for their responsive communication and flexibility, and the accomodations were very comfortable. It was absolutely worth the cost. Thank you, Christine!
Had an amazing experience, great hosts & nice area. Felt welcomed. Hosts were very friendly and great with communication.
Nice Master suite!
Christine's place was a wonderful respite after a long drive. The place is lovely, spotless, and provided ample space to relax. It was easy to find and the check-in process was seamless.
Brand new modern private suite in nice and quiet neighborhood. About 10-15 mins away from busy downtown Twin Falls. It was perfect!

Christine’s place was great and provided just what we needed. I want to highlight that it is very clean and comfy! The bed is extremely comfortable as well as the pillows! The place was peaceful and felt private. Would recommend it for anyone looking for a beautiful comfortable cozy clean spot (:
Very clean and peaceful place to stay. It was perfect and just what we needed. We definitely will stay here again if in the area again.

Wow, what a beautiful home, neighborhood, and space! The location was easy to get to and the location was so peaceful quiet. The space itself was gorgeous and very generous in size. We loved ALL of it: the comfy bed, linens and pillows, the separate kitchenette, the spacious and modern bathroom and the decor - so attractive!! Wish we could have stayed longer!!
Quiet, clean and comfortable place to stay. Would stay again if in the area.

I felt very at home here! The place was easy to find and the flexible check in was super nice. The place was also very well furnished with a tv and a good sized bed. The bathroom was also pretty good size and super clean! All in all I think this place is awesome and I recommend to anyone!
I only stayed for a night but this was a great stay right off the highway! The place was very clean and Christine and Troy were very responsive and accommodating. Would stay again!
Great, clean place. We stayed for one night while traveling cross country. Very communicative hosts made everything a snap. Highly recommend!
Awesome place! Wonderful lay out!
Very easy off and on the interstate. Quiet surroundings. Clean accommodation. Would stay again.

Christine and Troy's place was just as they described! It was exactly what we needed for our stay in Idaho. The bed is so comfortable and the area where it is located is very peaceful! Check-in and the instructions given were easy/clear. Christine and Troy were very responsive to any questions I had as well as made sure we had everything we needed! Thank you Christine and Troy for being great hosts!

Christine's place was amazing! It's such a great place to stay. It was really close to all the places we wanted to visit. Place was one of the cleanest we have stayed in. The interior design was beautiful, too. It had everything we needed for our stay to be comfortable. The instructions for everything were clear and felt right at home. Will definitely stay here again.
Quiet clean comfortable space. The room is right off the main house and you definitely can hear the family. I would stay again
Christine place is beautiful, clean and comfortable, I I was able to walk the neighborhood and I felt safe , all the sightseeing were close by. we would definitely stay there again
Nice cozy place to stay . Clean and comfortable
Super clean, nice quite neighborhood

Kimberly and Troy’s rental unit was perfect. Very clean, modern, in a new subdivision. One of the best bathroom’s we have experienced on Airbnb. Troy was easy to deal with, great communication and response time. Definitely would recommend this place when visiting the Twin Falls area.

rested so well at Christine's place on a overnight stay while driving from Portland to Oregon. we had some unanticipated challenges en route and our hosts were accommodating, gracious and empathetic. We certainly will be back if we're nearby and will recommend.

Great space for two. very NEW.
Nice host!
Darling rental! Had everything we needed. We wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again!
Great stay. Everything was easy to access and the room was clean!
Very nice, clean, and easy in/out. Would definitely stay again.

This suite is legitimately the cutest thing ever!! My husband and I loved it here, wish we could have stayed longer. Hosts were super helpful and friendly, would certainly come back if we’re ever in the area!
This is a great spot! It was comfortable, easy, and just what I was looking for. If I’m staying in the Twin Falls area again I’ll definitely stay here.

Great place for a weekend getaway! We have stayed here before and plan to stay in the future. It is clean, easy to get to, has all the things you need plus more! The hosts are always so responsive and they even let us check in a little early due to some changes with our travel plans!

We really enjoyed our stay! Everything at this location was very well arranged. The suite has an accessable layout which is open and eaay to navigate. The entire stay exceeded my expectations, considering my many experiences travelling and staying at vast variety of venues!
Thank You and Best Regards Christine and Troy.
Wonderful place! It worked great for breaking up my travel and was at a great price point.
Very nice and polite; room was way worth the rate

This cozy little space was perfect for our stay. The decor was adorable, the space fully functional, and the atmosphere cozy and comfy. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a place to stay while in the Twin Falls area.
Perfect in every way. I work often in the area & will return!
Very cute place to stay!
Amazing place and stay!
Everything was great!

The place is located in a quiet neighborhood and was easy to find. It was clean, spacious, and appeared to have been recently remodeled. The bed was also very comfortable. The hosts clearly put a lot of care and attention into making this place feel like a home away from home.
Space was awesome! Very clean and homey. Loved the private entrance and the privacy. Bed was very comfortable.
It was a very beautiful, modern and cozy apartment in a calm neighborhood. We immediately felt like home. The communication was easy and fast replied.
Very clean and very quiet. Was easy to find, check in was also easy. Would stay here again.

This place was absolutely the best! Check-in was easy, very clean and very peaceful. Christine was very helpful and recommended great restaurants and places to see in the area. We had an outside area for relaxing. If ever back in the area we would love to stay again.
Private, cozy suite - the perfect spot to rest on our long journey home. Friendly, responsive, and helpful hosts!
Thanks for the cozy stay and cute kitty!
Comfortable and peaceful after a long drive! Would definitely stay here again.
I enjoyed the clean and comfortable space
Christine’s place was the perfect place to crash on a road-trip! Super comfy and clean. Highly Recommend

We had a lovely stay here! The suite is very clean, new and the bed is very very comfy! We appreciated having access to a small kitchen to prepare light meals. Thanks for the great stay, would highly recommend
quiet and beautiful neighborhood. great for a transit stay of 1-2 days.
Loved the place. Very pretty and roomy. Would surely use this place again.
So clean and comfortable! One of my favorite airbnbs Ive stayed in! Cant recommend enough 👍🏻👍🏻
Modern, quiet and well decorated. Close to nearby attractions.

Great place to stay! The suite had a separate entrance with lots of space to park. The inside is brand new and BEAUTIFUL! There were instructions everywhere, which was very helpful. The bed was super comfortable, so it was a PERFECT overnight stay in the middle of our road trip. There was plenty of room for us to set up our daughter’s pack and play to sleep in, and they had an extra air mattress and more linens as well. It was an overall great experience!

Beautiful and quiet room. Had everything we needed for a night off the road. Beautifully decorated and welcoming. In a new neighborhood, out of town and peaceful. Very comfortable bed, like a soft cloud. Christine was very helpful with all aspects and check-in was a breeze. We were very comfortable here and would recommend this great place!

We absolutely loved our stay! The hosts were friendly and thought of just about everything you might need while staying there. The atmosphere is beautiful, clean, and calming. The bed was comfortable and you also can’t beat the price. We’d love to come stay again!

Perfection! One can tell how much thought has been put into making this space comfortable for guests. Top notch appliances, bed, linens, toiletries etc. Glad we stayed the night here on our road trip. Hosts seemed very nice and friendly!
Christines place was beautiful and so clean and comfortable with lots of room. Easy entry.
This place was perfect!!!! Absolutely worth every penny! Bed was big and comfy!!!

If you’re looking for a private and clean place to stay, I would highly recommend staying here. It is located in a very safe area and was a wonderful place to stay. The bed is one of the most comfortable beds I have ever slept on and is a king size, so it is plenty big. I would stay here again without second thought.
Nice quiet place with everything you would need for a night. Very cozy and comfortable!
Very communicative and responsive host! Loved the stay!

We stayed as a stop-over on our move/drive to Colorado. We wanted to stay somewhere that felt safe since we were leaving all of our possessions in our van. It was safe, clean, and very comfortable! Check in was private and easy, and the hosts were very kind when we were delayed and didn’t pull in till late at night. The bathroom is especially beautiful and for the same price as a low end hotel, this is MUCH better. Thank you!

Very pleasant stay. Roomy. Quiet. Close to the canyon. Took a couple bike rides around the area for fun. Very pleasant. Low traffic. Friendly people. Coming to the Twin Falls area this is the place to stay.
Thank you both for making our stay a great experience.
I love staying at Christine's it's a breath of fresh air at the end of my long business day... It's like coming home every time I walk through the door...
Everything went perfectly, place is quiet, clean. Highly recommended
I don't know how much praise one should give for a good night's rest... but I slept soundly last night... so thank you so much for hospitality.! ;-)
Lovely spot! Quiet and peaceful. Very clean and comfortable. 10/10 would recommend!

Troy and Christine were excellent hosts. They were friendly and responsive, yet left us alone to come and go whenever we needed to. The place was really nice and very clean. Loved the color scheme. The bed was super comfy with plenty of pillows. Cute little apartment for a weekend getaway.

We loved our stay here. Our bags never showed up at TWF, so we were very happy that there were amenities like body wash and shampoo available for us to use. The apartment is beautifully furnished, clean and well appointed. The kitchenette is stocked with coffee, creamer, sugar, and even hot chocolate and popcorn. We dug in to the popcorn! The Roku TV was great, and the bed is super comfortable. We definitely recommend this place.
Look NO FURTHER! My husband and I highly recommend this beautiful -and sparkling clean-slice of heaven!
Great place to stay. I have recommended this place to friends if they need to stay in the area.

Effective modern decor in keeping with the new build in this self-contained apartment. Super comfortable bed and all necessary items to make the stay easy and pleasant. Host friendly and helpful and the young cat was entertaining! I really enjoyed the stay.
Very clean, homey, and the hosts are very nice :)

Had everything needed for a quick overnight stay in that area. Very clean and beautiful area. Would definitely stay there again. The hosts were friendly and helpful and very quick to respond. Thank you for a great stay.
Such a beautiful, new, clean place. Bed was incredibly comfortable, everything was spotless, and the place was extremely spacious! If I’m ever back in the area, I’ll absolutely stay here again!

This was a great little stop for us! The place was super clean and much bigger than I was expecting. Large shower and bathroom area and the bed was very comfy! Christine was super responsive and helpful too! Would definitely stay again!

We had a great stay here. Our car was full to the ceiling as we were moving, and we felt the neighborhood was safe and quest so we didn’t have to worry about our vehicle. The Airbnb was one of the cleanest I’ve ever been in. We slept great and enjoyed our stay!
I would live here if I could! Wonderful place, beautiful room, very spacious, etc. Better than a 5 star hotel!
Squeaky clean place! Comfortable stay. Recommend it to everyone visiting Twin Falls.

This is the most beautiful place I've ever stayed. Everything was brand new and top of the line from the super comfortable king size bed to the awesome walking shower. I had a need for ice and she was there in minutes, super helpful! It is so quiet and peaceful I slept like a baby! I will definitely come back again and recommend to my friends and family.
This is our 2nd visit. After a long road trip it was comforting to know we'd be staying somewhere nice, clean and relaxing. We hope to visit again soon.

We had a very restful and great stay. The suite is beautiful and comfortable. It was easy to find and get into...as well as conveniently close to Twin Falls and Shoshone Falls.
We are looking forward to staying here again.
The suite was modern, clean and nicely decorated. We had everything we needed. We really liked the tranquil location. Everything was perfect. We would definitely stay here again.
Beautifully decorated, and clean!

Christine’s place was lovely- much needed after long day of driving:
Nice big bed, beautiful bathroom and well used kitchenette.
We needed a last minute place to stay after another airbnb canceled that morning. Easy to find, well lit, and easy to check in.
Wonderful place to stay! Very clean and nice decor. Christine even shared some muffins she made! Delicious! Very happy with our stay!
I had a quick stay and it was perfect! So clean, quiet and comfortable. It was decorated so cute and was spotless. The hosts were very responsive and friendly.
Christine's place more than met our expectations. It was super clean and relaxing and we look forward to our next stay there on our return trip home.

We had a lovely stay. Christine’s place was so comfortable, clean and cozy. It had everything we needed for an overnight stay and they were so good to work with.
We definitely would stay again:)
Toini~

New place , not close to town, great for just a place to sleep along a trip.
Nice place! Great for a stay over
I had a great time staying at Christie‘s place in Kimberly. I will definitely stay again. Very gracious hosts and perfect location.
Amazing space. Super clean, quiet, and easy to get to. Thanks so much for an amazing night. Very accommodating hosts! Don't pass this up.

We really enjoyed our stay. Troy and Christine were very kind and their place was as described. Also, clean, comfortable and quiet and the location was close to everything we needed. Thank you for sharing your place with us!
Seamless checkin. Very clean. Modern. Mattress was supreme and enjoyed the king size mattress.
Comfortable and clean spot, very flexible and kind.
Wonderful host with a wonderful Airbnb located close to all POIs

This place is beautiful. I was driving from WA to AZ. The space was amazing. I was nervous driving because of weather- which was not a problem. They always responded right away with kindness. The space is beautiful. The bed was super comfy. I had an amazing sleep. It was very quiet.
Once again, a wonderful stay 😊 Thank you!
A great place to stay for a weekend! Very clean and comfortable! Christine and her husband were very accommodating and responded quickly to all messages. Would definitely stay here again!
Would definitely recommend, very clean and peaceful place. Hosts were friendly and responsive.
Beautiful, clean private space. Check in was easy and host was very easy to communicate with.
A very Beautiful home. The house was very clean and comfortable.
Awesome place for the weekend. I would definitely recommend this place for a couple visiting twin falls area. It’s not to far from main roads into town and the neighborhood was very nice.
Great stay 👍
The place was very nice and comfortable. Communication was great. :)
Highly recommend staying here. Nice, new and clean. Friendly and helpful hosts. I will definitely stay again.

If you ever need to visit Twin Falls, This is the best place to go! Not only is it a reasonable price, but it was one of the most comfortable Airbnbs I have been in. In terms of environment, sleep, and privacy. 11/10 recommend!

The suite was gorgeous! Immaculately cleaned and decorated. The bed was huge and so soft, it was like sleeping on a cloud! Christine was helpful, accommodating, and made sure we were comfortable while providing ample privacy. Overall an excellent stay. I will be booking in the future when I come back to Idaho. :)
Beautiful new development home, extremely clean, quiet, private. Would recommend, and would certainly stay here again.

It was such a beautiful place! Very modern, clean, and quiet. The heater works well, and the bed was super comfy! It was very easy to access and was very private. Will definitely be staying here again!:)
Absolutely amazing! The bed was SO comfortable, we slept like babies. The home is new and very clean, in a nice neighborhood. Very good deal!

Christine was friendly and responsive. Her listing was exactly as described/pictured. The bed and pillows were so comfortable. Room was clean and spacious. Bathroom had all needed linens. Personal touches in the kitchenette were nice! Private room, quiet, and easily accessible. Check-in was a breeze. Exceeded my expectations for the value. Will definitely stay here again!
Very nice and pleasant experience. Very clean and comfortable. Marty was very friendly.
Marty has it going on. The bed waa super soft which I love. Thank you for having me Marty. Twin Falls is a beautiful city
It was pleasure to stay at this place. Marty is so friendly and helped us for what we need. Nice experience.
very comfortable

She was a great host !1
Wonderful stay. She thought of everything her guests could possibly need.
Great place to stay when in beautiful Twin Falls. Convenient location in quiet neighborhood. Marty was welcoming and greeted me upon my arrival. I would stay here again if it were available.
2nd time staying here and great yet again. She even let me use her washer and drier. 10/10
Marty's place has lots of amenities that really felt like a luxury to me. the bed was comfy and the house was easy to find.

Marty was a wonderful host. She was very responsive to all my questions and clearly communicated details and information. Her Airbnb is very cozy, comfortable, clean and private. If you are just looking for a place to stay for the night this is a great option for the money.
Marty is welcoming and kind. The home was nice and clean. The room felt like home.
Cozy and affordable place. Marty is a friendly and helpful host. We really enjoyed our stay there. Definitely recommend!
It felt just like home! So clean and so cozy. Loved Marty and her cute little dog ❤️
super nice lady, nice room, easy system. and had a over all great stay. i would 100% recommend staying here. love the little dog dot as well. will stay again.

We had a quick overnight on a road trip and this was a perfect spot to stop. Comfortable bed, clean spaces, quiet. Marty was very kind and welcoming. Nice to have a little desk and fridge in the room, plus very thoughtful to have charging cords in the bedside tables. Would definitely stay here again.
Great place
Great stay!
Always a pleasure!

Marty is a great hostess! The room was beautiful, comfortable, and spotless. The bathroom, as well. The kitchen cabinets are clearly labeled. Quiet neighborhood close to the falls. I will definitely stay there next time I'm passing through!
Marty is a delight! I've stayed with her 3 years in a row and it's always great!
Great stay i recommend 100 percent
Marty was away, but her house was welcoming and as described. We'd be happy to go back.
Had a pleasant stay at Marty’s. The place was clean and very well organised with everything I needed including kitchen and laundry access. Loved the Halloween deco!

Excellent stay. In fact, so much so that I extended my stay. Can highly recommend Marty and her place which is in a nice road and neighborhood within a few minutes drive to all amenities. Marty has been super responsive and provided clear instructions.
I enjoyed staying here. We’ll kept and clean house with very helpful instructions on how to get in.
Easy to check in and bed was very comfy. Would recommend

My stay at Marty's place was very pleasant; Marty is the epitome of the friendly, well-meaning and well-organized host.
Unfortunately, due to the nightmare experience I had with Airbnb in another city I can no longer recommend Airbnb to anyone. Airbnb's customer service is more accurately described as "customer abuse." I would have ended up sleeping in the street had I not made my own (hotel) arrangements in another city, 50 miles away; I had to cut my visit to Washington State short as a result. I will not use Airbnb again. I hope hosts like Marty will demand that Airbnb scrap its current "customer support" operation and rebuild it from the ground up with a completely new team and the value of actually helping customers.
Another - and perhaps better - option for Marty would be to abandon Airbnb altogether in favor of a hosting platform that values customers (guests).

Marty's playlce feel just like home~ she has a lot of things you can use in the kitchen too~ highly recommended for those who look for short term/longer term stay. (p.s. I am going back to stay at her place one more night after I finish my trip)
Marty is an amazing host. Very welcoming and friendly. Super comfortable bed and pillows with a very clean and beautiful home. Very flexible with time too. Would highly recommend!
Always a pleasure

The room in Marty’s home was clean, comfortable, and had everything I needed. There was a TV, charging cords, towels, a small refrigerator, and the cute bathroom was right next to my room. The neighborhood is quiet and very walkable. I took a walk after my long day in the car!

Great stay for the night as I passed through and explore part of Idaho. Marty was very responsive and had everything I needed. The one downside was that I wanted to use the hot tub, as it was a listed amenity. But when I got there I was informed that it was closed.

I stayed for a night. It was easy check-in. I did not meet Marty in person but we communicated over the chat and she was very responsive. The house is super clean and has everything you need for a good night stay.

I loved this stay! I felt quite at home there. I got a very pleasant feeling from this stay. We were allowed to use the kitchen to cook for ourselves, everything was super clean, the sheets smoke deliciously. I would go back soon!
As described. Good location

Marty is great and her home is excellent, clean, and very comfortable. I feel right at home there, so much so that I have reoccurring weekly business in Twin falls and have made arrangements to stay at her place once a week over the next few months.

I was traveling across several states and just needed an easy, quiet place to get some sleep and Marty’s place was perfect for that. I sadly didn’t get to meet her in person but I appreciate her thoughtfulness and care. Would definitely stay again.
great place perfect for a quick stop on a long ride!
Friendly host. Clean room and bathroom. I have a good rest. Clean room and bathroom. I have a good rest.
Very comfortable place and friendly host!
Marty was extremely friendly and her home was a great place to stay for a night on a road trip. The room was clean and had everything you need!
The bed was very comfortable and the room was very nice. This was one of my better AirBnB experiences. Top notch!
Marty’s home was lovely and I had a great stay there!

This was my very first experience booking an Airbnb. I can’t say enough positive things about Marty and her home and the experience we had at her place. The home was centrally located and close to all amenities in Twin Falls. It was a great value and the neighborhood was safe and quiet. The turtle reef bedroom was comfortable (loved having our own frig in the room) and the shared bathroom was clean. The shared kitchen space was accessible and easy to navigate with labeled cabinets and drawers to easily locate items. Marty’s home had everything a person could ever want or need. She was an accommodating host and went above and beyond for me and my granddaughter. It was everything I was looking for and more in an airbnb (including the basement where my granddaughter could play with children’s toys as well as a large outdoor area for playing outside as well). Enjoyed staying at her place. Would stay again in a heartbeat and would recommend others book a stay too. Thank you Marty!
Wonderful stay. Very comfortable and spotless. Central location and close to all amenities in Twin Falls. Would recommend for anyone going to this area

Only stayed one night during a road trip, but was a great stop. Appreciated the clear instructions and responsiveness when I had a question! The room was cozy and clean, and the shared spaces like the kitchen were easy to navigate and nice to have accessible. Very convenient place to stay between long days of traveling!
Great spot. We stayed there and night while road tripping to Oregon and it was easy to check in, and had clear instructions. Would stay again!
Marty was extremely thorough in describing everything I needed to know. Enjoyed staying at her place. Calm quiet and hassle free. Would recommend anyone visiting twin falls.
Staying with Marty really enjoyed staying at Marty's place! Pleasant contact and clear in description. We were allowed to pretend to be home and that's how it felt. Thank you Marty!
A nice spot for a quick sleep & out the next day. I think other air bnb guests were staying there as well so that made us a little weary but overall not a bad spot!
